app = angular.module('myModule', [])

app.controller 'HogeController',
  class HogeController
    constructor: (@$window) ->
    text: 'Lorem ipsum'
    say: -> @$window.alert(@text)

app.controller 'FugaController',
  class FugaController
    constructor: ($scope, $window) ->
      $scope.text = 'Lorem ipsum'
      $scope.say = -> $window.alert($scope.text)

class Controller
  @getController: ->
    required = angular.injector().annotate(@)
    required.unshift('$scope')
    required.push ($scope, args...) =>
      for key, value of new @()
        if typeof value is 'function'
          $scope[key] = value.bind($scope)
        else
          $scope[key] = value
      @apply($scope, args)
    required

class PiyoController extends Controller
  constructor: (@$window) ->
  text: 'Lorem ipsum'
  say: -> @$window.alert(@text)

app.controller 'piyo', PiyoController.getController()
